name: Networm
description: Networm is the debut title from Cuddly Zombie Games - A retro-themed hacking game inspired by 80's sci-fi films and the card game "Netrunner".
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: 2 GHZ Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any DX9 compliant card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Controller Support was built for Xbox 360 controllers - Others may or may not behave correctly

reviews.review_text: fun game i bought it to give it a shot and it is good for when you disire a good helping of good music, fast paced gameplay, and a pinch of rage
